fields.title: Even Days
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least number of hours scheduled on the same day as the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: Even Schedules
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least number of total hours scheduled.

fields.title: Fewer Similar Shifts
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least number of shifts that have any of the same flags as the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: Fewer Shifts that are the Same
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least number of shifts that have the same exact flags as the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: More Frequent Breaks
fields.description: Selects the person who has the most time in their schedule before and after the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: Longer Breaks
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least time in their schedule before and after the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: Less Difficult Schedules
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least total hours scheduled of shifts marked difficult.

fields.title: Less Difficult Days
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least total hours scheduled of shifts marked difficult in the same day as the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: Fewer Difficult Days in a Row
fields.description: Selects the person who has the least total hours scheduled of shifts marked difficult in the day before and after the shift to be scheduled.

fields.title: More Time to Sleep
fields.description: Select the person with the least ammount of change to the time between their last shift of the day and their first shift of the following day.

fields.title: More Shifts Covered
fields.description: Selects the person would could cover the least number of shifts at the same time as the shift that is trying to be placed.

fields.title: Larger Off Day Windows
fields.description: Selects the person with the smallest change to the time they end before their off day and the time they start after their off day.

fields.title: Working with More People
fields.description: Selects the person who currently works with the least ammount of people already working this shift.

fields.title: Ending Days Earlier
fields.description: Selects the person who has the smallest ammount of change in their latest shift of the day given this shift.

fields.title: Starting Days Later
fields.description: Selects the person who has the smallest ammount of change in their earliest shift of the day given this shift.

fields.title: Later Mornings, Earlier Nights
fields.description: Slects the person who has the smallest change in both their earliest and their latest shift of the day given this shift.
